name: UltraFast MCP Sequential Thinking Server
description: High-performance Rust-based MCP server for sequential thinking with dynamic problem-solving capabilities

tools.name: sequential_thinking
tools.description: A detailed tool for dynamic and reflective problem-solving through thoughts. This tool helps analyze problems through a flexible thinking process that can adapt and evolve. Each thought can build on, question, or revise previous insights as understanding deepens.

thought.description: The content of the current thought

thoughtNumber.description: The sequential number of this thought

totalThoughts.description: Estimated total number of thoughts needed

nextThoughtNeeded.description: Whether more thoughts are needed after this one

isRevision.description: Whether this thought revises a previous thought

revisesThought.description: The number of the thought being revised (if isRevision is true)

branchFromThought.description: The number of the thought to branch from

needsMoreThoughts.description: Whether the thinking process needs more thoughts

tools.name: export_session
tools.description: Export the current thinking session in various formats (JSON, Markdown, etc.)

tools.name: analyze_session
tools.description: Analyze the current thinking session and provide insights about the thinking process

tools.name: merge_sessions
tools.description: Merge multiple thinking sessions into one comprehensive session

sessionIds.description: Array of session IDs to merge
